snippet: Victims’ advocates complained that the unprecedented public statement of papal contrition over the scandal is still just “talk.”
abstract: Pope Francis says he takes personal responsibility for the harm done by priests who sexually abused children; pledges that the Roman Catholic Church will confront the issue unflinchingly and impose sanctions when necessary.
lead_paragraph: Victims’ advocates complained that the unprecedented public statement of papal contrition over the scandal is still just “talk.”

headline.main: Pope Takes Responsibility in Priests’ Abuse Scandal
